tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr Prashant is humble and polite, he would patiently listen to all my questions related to my daughter. Dr is friendly and always ready to make us understand our doubts.
Everytime I visit him It's his posstivity that always makes me feel better. My daughter has always been underweight, Dr has always tried to make me understand that it's only through proper care baby's over all development can be achieved. He would never scare, ***** ***** ********* *********** **********  Would always stress on home cooked meals for the baby. 
We are really fortunate to have him as my child's pediatrician from day one.
Thank you Dr.
